about_me.des: A results-driven analytical software engineer that gets things done. Strong in design and integration problem solving skills. Expert in C# with knowledge of vast array technologies in web development.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.psl2_des: Promoted to Project Lead. Contributed in Healthcare workforce management using majorly microsoft technologies then a banking project about pricing using mern stack
career.bt_des: Promoted to Sr. Software Engineer with a "Impressive Initiator" award.    Started to work on some awsome technologies like apache.ignite, Fody, QrCoder.    Developing a distributed in memory image cache using Apache.Ignite.    Weaving .net assemblies using Fody.    Creating dynamic QrCode with image overlay.    Developing a Validation Engine in C# and Typescript to control validation from excel.
career.btj_des: Joined Brain Technosys as a Software Engineer.     Worked in a Sport and two Ecommerce web applications.    Developed web api with self testing suite.    Learned EAV design pattern, t4 templates, git, Web API, WCF, unit test, C# 6 features and various design patterns.    Extended my knowledge to ElasticSearch, Cassandra and Microsoft Logging.
career.atg_des: Started my development career in .Net Technologies. Learned Asp.Net MVC with various aspects of web development.
